channel.title: [317] Serenthia Beta, Oldschool PvP, Skills, Bosses. NEWCONTENT
channel.description:
[center][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/j24urectvjkwk5u/basicBanner.png[/img]
[SIZE=5]Please note, make sure you have the latest version of java downloaded to use the client jar[/SIZE] [SIZE=4]Serenthia is a PvP based server 317 revision (with 568 models).
Latest: Preview of the Zombie Horde event (: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YdJG7t1en2g Please note any lag is caused by my screen recorder.
[LEFT] Features include: PvP everywhere, with select safe areas. World Random Events. [COLOR="red"]Zombie Horde Event.[/COLOR] Perfect Combat & including magic and range in its entirety Bosses Mini-games Lots of great shops Skilling (Safe area's to train combat and skills) Lag free and fast host. Many many more. [/LEFT] [URL=http://"http://serenthia.uboxi.com/clients/client001.jar"]Download[/URL] client and this will automatically download the cache.
JUST IN: [LEFT] Zombie Horde World Event [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/ch4tuia9530c55e/zombiehorde.png[/img] [/LEFT]
Future updates: [LEFT] [ul][*]More training area's [*]Custom team based PvP minigames [*]Add more safe areas [*]Use mysql to database on website and game [*]use databases to create a highscore system (skill and kill)[/ul]
[/LEFT]
[SPOILER=Basic Features Gallery]Perfect combat :D [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img913/7410/V3hsT8.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img673/6421/UTDGg9.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img661/7342/vhtnNF.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img537/9249/0gEUyN.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img910/5890/QTOqRa.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/5v1xtbpb0xtttgx/kbd1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/b9kr6zivaw8r2qx/kbd2.png[/img] [SPOILER=More Features Gallery][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/pc0si0dwsklubsa/incrdrprts.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/2t5s6za9mjpd8lr/slrtwr.png[/img][/SPOILER]
Any comments are greatly appreciated. :)
[LEFT]No registration is required at this time, just log in with your desired username and password. In future there will be a register on website, highscore and forum. :) You will receive a starter kit of Combat equipment money and food, you can earn more money by stealing from the tables that are near the bank. To get to a training area ie the rockcrabs there is a teleport in place of varrock for training area's.[/LEFT]
Hope to see you ingame! [/center]

item.title: [317] Serenthia Beta, Oldschool PvP, Skills, Bosses. NEWCONTENT
item.dc:creator: @MrSenior420 MrSenior420
item.description:
@MrSenior420 wrote:

I’m going to do a mass of updates today and add some unique content

Thanks for suggestions though.
I will get more media and more content.

  • Sam

EDIT:
Updated World Event: Zombie Horde.
Hope you enjoy

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Serenthia Beta, Oldschool PvP, Skills, Bosses. NEWCONTENT

item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Perhaps including more media and features into your advert thread may entice people to play your server, everything you have listed here is in a standard 317 client/server already.

Good luck with your server

[SIZE=4]Serenthia is a PvP based server 317 revision (with 568 models).

Latest:
Preview of the Zombie Horde event (:


Please note any lag is caused by my screen recorder.

[LEFT]
Features include:
PvP everywhere, with select safe areas.
World Random Events.
[COLOR=“red”]Zombie Horde Event.[/COLOR]
Perfect Combat & including magic and range in its entirety
Bosses
Mini-games
Lots of great shops
Skilling (Safe area’s to train combat and skills)
Lag free and fast host.
Many many more.

[]Add more safe areas
[]Use mysql to database on website and game

Any comments are greatly appreciated.

[LEFT]No registration is required at this time, just log in with your desired username and password.
In future there will be a register on website, highscore and forum.
You will receive a starter kit of Combat equipment money and food, you can earn more money by stealing from the tables that are near the bank.
To get to a training area ie the rockcrabs there is a teleport in place of varrock for training area’s.[/LEFT]

Hope to see you ingame!
